abilities.title: Crude Tunneler
abilities.description: Goblins dig crude but functional tunnels, identifying natural vs. constructed origins and age. Base Skill: 30% +5% per level of experience. Nightvision 90 ft (27.4 m), good day vision.

abilities.title: Simple Architect
abilities.description: Goblins build basic, crude underground structures and can locate/deactivate traps when cautious. Base Skill: 10% +5% per level of experience; trap detection/deactivation at half skill level.

abilities.title: Underground Sense
abilities.description: Goblins have a less acute sense of direction underground, determining direction, depth, and slope, with poor surface structure judgment. Base Direction Skill: 20% +5% per level; Surface Structure Skill: 10% +5% per level (-20% in unfamiliar areas).

abilities.title: O.C.C. Bonuses
abilities.description: +1 to save vs faerie magic, +2 to save vs horror factor.
